description.value: You drop your disguise at the right moment and surprise your target. After you @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Impersonate] someone else using a disguise kit, you can remove your disguise with a dramatic gesture. Any creatures that previously failed to see through your disguise are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Off-Guard] against the next attack you make before the end of your turn.
